sen.j: 天神川（てんじんがわ）は、京都府京都市を流れる淀川水系の一級水系。
sen.e: Tenjin-gawa River belongs to the first-calss water system of the Jodo-gaw River water system.
Tenjin-gawa River belongs to the first-calss water system of the Jodo-gaw River water system.
Tenjin-gawa River belongs to the first-class rivers of the Yodo-gawa River system.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 上流部は紙屋川とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: Its upstream portion is also called Kamiya-gawa River.
Its upstream portion is also called Kamiya-gawa River.
Its upstream portion is also called Kamiya-gawa River.

sen.j: 古くは西堀河と称した。
sen.e: In the parst, it was called Nishi Horikawa.
In the past, it was called Nishi Horikawa.
In the past, it was called Nishi Hori-kawa River.

sen.j: 「天神川」の名は、中流で北野天満宮の西を流れていることによる。
sen.e: The name of "Tenjin-gawa River " is given because its middlestream portion flows on the west side of Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine.
The name of "Tenjin-gawa River " is given because its middlestream portion flows on the west side of Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine.
The name of 'Tenjin-gawa River' is given because its middlestream portion flows on the west side of Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine.
sen.cmt: " → ' としました。スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: なお、その北野天満宮と接する付近に御土居が残る。
sen.e: Odoi (earth wall) still remains around the area where this river borders Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine.
Odoi (earth wall) still remains around the area where this river borders Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine.
Odoi (earth wall) still remains around the area where this river borders Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: また、四条～西京極橋の左岸にはソメイヨシノの桜並木が延々と続き、開花シーズンになれば壮麗な眺めになり、桜の名所の一つとして市民に親しまれている。
sen.e: On the left bank of the Shijo-to-Nishi-Kyogoku-bashi Bridge portion of the river, Someiyoshino cherry trees are lined for a very long distance, and their blossoms in full bloom provide a magnificient view, being favored by the citizen as a beauty spot of enjoying cherry blossoms.

On the left bank of the Shijo-to-Nishi-Kyogoku-bashi Bridge portion of the river, Someiyoshino cherry trees are lined for a very long distance, and their blossoms in full bloom provide a magnificient view, are are favored by citizens as a beauty spot to enjoy cherry blossoms.

On the left bank of the Shijo-to-Nishi-Kyogoku-bashi Bridge portion of the river, Someiyoshino cherry trees are lined for a very long distance, and their blossoms in full bloom provide a magnificent view, are favored by citizens as a beauty spot to enjoy cherry blossoms.
sen.cmt: ダブりを削除しました。

sen.j: 京都市右京区鳴滝の沢山（標高515.8m）東麓に発し、一旦北流。
sen.e: This river originates in the east foot of Sawa Mountain in Narutaki, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City (the altittude: 158 m) and initially flows to the north.
This river originates in the east foot of Sawa Mountain in Narutaki, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City (the altittude: 158 m) and initially flows to the north.
This river originates in the east foot of Mt. Sawa in Narutaki, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City (the altitude: 515.8 m) and initially flows to the north.
sen.cmt: mt. sawa としました。数字を修正しました。

sen.j: 鷹峯台地を囲むように東へ出た後は概ね南流、京都市街の衣笠・北野を潤す。
sen.e: It reaches the east side of the Takamine (鷹峯) plateau after flowing around it, flows mostly southwards after that and then flows through the Kinugawa/Kitano districts of the Kyoto uban area.
It reaches the east side of the Takamine (鷹峯) plateau after flowing around it, flows mostly southwards after that and then flows through the Kinugawa/Kitano districts of the Kyoto uban area.
It reaches the east side of the Takamine (鷹峯) plateau after flowing around it, flows mostly southwards after that and then flows through the Kinugasa/Kitano districts of the Kyoto urban area.

sen.j: 北野天満宮の西方を流れ、しばらくのあいだ西大路通の東側100mあたりを並行して南進する。
sen.e: It flows through the west side of Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine, and flows sothwards in prallel with Nishi-odori Street at about 100-m east of it.
It flows through the west side of Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine, and flows sothwards in prallel with Nishi-odori Street at about 100-m east of it.
It flows through the west side of Kitano Temnan-gu Shrine, and flows southwards in parallel with Nishi-odori Street at about 100-m east of it.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 花園付近(円町駅の南方)で西に寄って御室川を併せ、西高瀬川と交差。
sen.e: After its flow direction changes to the west at around Hanazono (in the south of Enmachi Station), it merges Omuro-gawa River and crosses Nishi Takase-gawa River.
After its flow direction changes to the west at around Hanazono (in the south of Enmachi Station), it merges with Omuro-gawa River and crosses Nishi Takase-gawa River.
After its flow direction changes to the west at around Hanazono (in the south of Enmachi Station), it merges with Omuro-gawa River and crosses Nishi Takase-gawa River.

sen.j: 御室川合流から西京極まで天神川通（国道162号・京都市道184号宇多野吉祥院線）と並行してさらに南流し、南区吉祥院下ノ向町で桂川 (淀川水系)に注ぐ。
sen.e: After merging Omuro-gawa River, it flows furthter southwards in parallel with Tenjingwa-dori Street (national road 162/the Utanokisshoin route of Kyoto municipal road 184) before reaching Nishi-Kyogoku, finally being merged into Katsura-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) in Kisshoin Shimonomukai Cho, Minami ward.

After merging with Omuro-gawa River, it flows furthter southwards in parallel with Tenjingwa-dori Street (national road 162/the Utanokisshoin route of Kyoto municipal road 184) before reaching Nishi-Kyogoku, finally being merged into Katsura-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) in Kisshoin Shimonomukai Cho, Minami ward.

After merging with Omuro-gawa River, it flows further southwards in parallel with Tenjingwa-dori Street (National Route 162/the Utanokisshoin Line of Kyoto Municipal Route 184) before reaching Nishi-Kyogoku, finally being merged into Katsura-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system) in Kisshoin Shimonomukai-cho, Minami Ward.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

tit.e: Autonomous bodies through which the river flows
Autonomous bodies through which the river flows
Autonomous bodies through which the river flows

sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture
Kyoto Prefecture
Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 京都市右京区、北区 (京都市)、上京区、中京区、右京区、南区 (京都市)
sen.e: Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kita Ward (of Kyoto City), Kamigyo Ward, Nakagyo Ward, Ukyo Ward and Minami Ward (of Kyoto City)
Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kita Ward (of Kyoto City), Kamigyo Ward, Nakagyo Ward, Ukyo Ward and Minami Ward (of Kyoto City)
Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kita Ward (Kyoto City), Kamigyo Ward, Nakagyo Ward, Ukyo Ward and Minami Ward (Kyoto City)
